typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Key as integer,
		Name as string,
		Phone as string,
		Last_m as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> sourceData
sourceData exists(ERROR_FUNCTION('') == ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
